title: Luffy's Straw Hat Contains Ancient Power
summary: A theory that the straw hat Shanks gave Luffy contains hidden power or significance beyond its sentimental value.
fullText: Fans have theorized that Luffy's iconic straw hat may be more than just a symbol of his promise with Shanks. Some believe it could be connected to Joy Boy, ancient weapons, or contain some hidden power that will be revealed later in the series.
author: Reddit User: OnePieceTheoryKing

source.title: Theory: The Straw Hat's True Power
